lead_paragraph: Mystery surrounds the identity of a child whose coffin was unearthed by a construction crew at a home on property that once housed a cemetery in San Francisco.

headline.print_headline: A Little Girl Lost, Then Found More Than a Century Later
headline.main: A Little Girl Lost, Then Found More Than a Century Later

snippet: Mystery surrounds the identity of a child whose coffin was unearthed by a construction crew at a home on property that once housed a cemetery in San Francisco.
abstract: Remains of unidentified three-year-old girl, discovered in San Francisco during housing construction, have become object of international interest, and number of experts, including archaeologists, are engaged in project of trying to determine her identity; remains were relocated to necropolis in Colma, and reburial ceremony was attended by large number of people.
